attributes.action: Stop delaying Brexit! We want to leave, with or without a deal on 31st Oct 2019!
attributes.additional_details: Politicians keep saying what they think the voting public want or don't want, lets show them that whether or not we like the outcome of the Referendum, democracy must rule! Majority vote rules! Let's just get on with it!
attributes.background: The people have voted on a Referendum and in doing so stated the wish to leave the EU. The public are tired of the in-fighting, and muddle and just want to get on with it now! We are tired of hearing what 'could' happen after Brexit, and demand our voices are heard!
